#summary the basics about datasets and feeds

= Introduction =

This describes the various dynamically generated data-sets within the framework. These data-sets can be used as:

 * IDS rules
 * name-server zones
 * firewall rules
 * and more...

= Getting Started =

Before you begin, make sure you review the [Taxonomy] page. This will help with measuring your risk tolerance and which feed combinations you should use.

The simplest feed to get started with is the [FeedsBotnet#Infrastructure Botnet Infrastructure] feed. Typically botnet infrastructure is tagged with a severity of "high", meaning, if you combine this with a "high confidence" observation, it's likely that you're dealing with a concreate infection.
